directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.  Heat cheese sauce in microwave, 1 minute.  In 8 x 8 inch baking dish, combine cooked pasta, cheese sauce, sliced frankfurters, Parmesan and oregano.  Top with crumbled crackers and bake 10 minutes.
title: Easy Mac 'n' Cheese
